tagline: The source code for the Fast ASP.NET websites book
body:
### Fast ASP.NET websites
Welcome to FAST ASP.NET websites. This Github repository contains all the source code and files that you will need to follow along with in the book. Right from chapter 1, we take a slow, poorly performing website right up to chapter 12 where the website is optimized for speed and performance. The book covers essential tips and tricks that you can apply to your ASP.NET websites today.

### The chapters in the book

**Part 1 - Defining Performance**

●	Chapter 1 - High Speed Websites

●	Chapter 2 - The first steps toward a better performing website

**Part 2 - General Performance Best Practices**

●	Chapter 4 - The Sell-By Date

●	Chapter 5 - Minifying and Bundling Static Files

●	Chapter 6 - HTML Optimization Tips

●	Chapter 7 - Image Optimizations

●	Chapter 8 - Configuring ETags

●	Chapter 9 - Content Delivery Networks

**Part 3 - ASP.net Specific Techniques**

●	Chapter 10 – Improving ASP.net MVC Performance

●	Chapter 11 – Improving ASP.net Webforms performance

●	Chapter 12 - Data Caching
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Fast ASP.Net Websites
